ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
1 cup candy-coated milk chocolate pieces (such as M&M's®)
1 (12 ounce) package white vanilla baking chips

cookingTips: Melt white baking chips in short microwave intervals, stirring between each, to prevent overheating
Toss warm mixture quickly for even coating of melted chocolate
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through tempering white chocolate for a smooth coating and proper tossing technique to evenly coat all ingredients.
